overview:
Trindade Investimentos is a Brazil-based investment firm focused on providing both capital and strategic resources to startup companies in the technology industry and other middle market companies that find themselves in urgent need of financial resources, either to finance their working capital needs or to overcome other special situations.

Through its focus on Venture Capital, principally in the technology sector, Trindade Investimentos brings various resources to entrepreneurs in addition to capital, including financial, legal and strategic management for the development of their businesses or ideas. Trindade looks for innovative products or services that cater to the profile of the Brazilian market and that are scalable, either within the existing market structure or within one that can be executed in partnership with Trindade.
